Tunable.name: TAN_LEVEL_OBJECT_STATE
Tunable.description: The object state that represents a Sims tan level.

TunableList.name: TAN_LEVEL_TO_STATE_MAP
TunableList.description: Map of tan level to object state that corresponds to that tan level. Used on save/load to set the state of the Sim object to persist the tan state correctly.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: Tan level that needs to be persisted.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The object state value that represents the persisted tan level that needs to be set on load.

Tunable.name: TAN_PRANK_BUFF
Tunable.description: A Sim that has this buff will generate new tan lines based on their current outfit when changing tan level.

TunableList.name: TAN_PRANK_CAS_PARTS
TunableList.description: A list of CAS parts from which a random entry is selected if a Sim has been pranked to generate tan lines.

Tunable.description: CAS part to use to generate tan lines for a Sim that has been pranked.

Tunable.name: UPDATE_TAN_LINES_BUFF
Tunable.description: A Sim that has this buff will generate new tan lines based on their current outfit when changing tan level.
